title: BACnetGetClientDeviceCommunication (Function)
text:
FUNCTION BACnetGetClientDeviceCommunication :
IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Retrieves the current device communication control value for the specified device.
The user application can request the current communication enable state for registered
devices.

rows.Name: devId
rows.Comment:
The device instance number for which communication needs to be requested. A value of
0xFFFFFFFF will retrieve the global communication enable / disable state.

rows:
A pointer to hold the requested communication state which is
filled by the API.
